These events can be quite traumatic. (You might begin to speculate about how your laboratory mice might feel at the hands of your human scientists.) The human is viewed as a thing rather than a being with needs, desires and feelings. Human genetic material is quite valuable to some ET groups, and there are interspecies breeding experiments underway, particularly within the Zeta factions. The Zeta have had some success with this hybrid race and their experimentation continues. Self awareness and soul awareness are the human’s greatest protection from abduction violation. The abductee-training encounters are usually perceived by the human as traumatic until the personality moves through the fear of the unknown and actively pursues answers, support and validation of the experience. Once fear subsides further conscious contact is usually initiated by the teacher abductors and the human embarks upon a path of accelerated spiritual growth and awakening to the soul identity. Some abductees will begin to remember the soul agreements they had made and center the rest of their lives around fulfilling those agreements.
